DOC.brief_summary: The principal aim study determine effect n3-PUFA top standard therapy surrogate marker disease severity and/or prognosis patient PAD . Treatment duration 3 month , final follow-up plan 6 month inclusion . Primary outcome parameter endothelial function assess flow-mediated vasodilation use brachial artery ultrasound . Secondary outcome measure comprise maximum pain-free treadmill walk distance , pulse wave velocity , whole blood viscosity , platelet activation plasma marker inflammation .
